content: प्रमाथिन् {%<ab>a.</ab>%} {@--1@} Tormenting, harassing, torturing, afflicting, harrowing; क्व रुजा हृदयप्रमाथिनी क्व च ते विश्वसनीयमायुधं <ls>M. 3. 2</ls>; <ls>Māl. 2. 1</ls>; <ls>Ki. 3. 14.</ls> {@--2@} Killing, destroying. {@--3@} Agitating, setting in motion; <ls>Bg. 2. 60</ls>; <ls n="Bg.">6. 34.</ls> {@--4@} Tearing or pulling down, striking down; <ls>R. 11. 58.</ls> {@--5@} Cutting down; <ls>Ki. 17. 31.</ls> {%--<ab>m.</ab>%} <ab>N.</ab> of a year.
